column4: hello guys I think that I have a strange problem and I could use some help. I'm running ubuntu in virtialbox for some time and now I cant save anything I tried to cp a file to another directory and it gave me a file system is read only error I did a chmod on the folder and got the same error. I tried to create a file on my desktop and once again got the filesystem is read only.
check your "mount" command for your file systems as read only (ro)
yeah, sounds like your filesystem went read only, i'm guessing there was an fsck run on boot
